content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you will find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. How much are you willing to pay for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm interested in your apartment, but I'm a student, so I have to be careful with my budget. I'm looking for a price that is fair and affordable. Could you tell me what the lowest price is that you would consider for this apartment?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I'm always looking to get the best deal for my property. However, I'm willing to negotiate a price that is fair for both parties. What is your maximum budget for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm looking to pay around 800 Euros per month, all-inclusive. This is my absolute maximum budget, and I'm hoping we can agree on a price within this range.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 800 Euros per month is not acceptable for this apartment. The location and amenities justify a higher price. Would you be willing to pay 1,000 Euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position, but 1,000 Euros per month is still outside of my budget. I'm really hoping to find a solution that works for both of us. Is there any wiggle room on your part?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yes, I'm willing to negotiate. How about 950 Euros per month? This is the lowest I can go for this prime location. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 950 Euros per month is still a bit too high for me. I'm really trying to find a place that fits within my 800 Euros budget. Is there anything else you can offer to make the deal more attractive for me?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 800 Euros per month is simply not feasible for this apartment. The market value and the amenities provided justify the price I'm asking. If you're unable to meet the 950 Euros per month, I'm afraid we may not be able to reach an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I respect your position, but I must also stick to my budget. Since 950 Euros per month is the lowest you can go, I'm afraid I cannot agree to that price. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is still outside of my budget. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
